content: Yes, I acknowledge. I have expertise in both SEO and legal writing, which will allow me to create high-quality content that is optimized for search engines and relevant to your target audience. I will work to ensure that your service page for a contract lawyer is informative, engaging, and provides value to your potential clients. Additionally, I will use my knowledge of SEO best practices to optimize the content for the target keywords and help your page rank higher in search engine results pages (SERPs).
